actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to provide the death penalty for assassinating, or attempting to assassinate, Federal elective officeholders, or persons seeking election to Federal office.

summary.text: Provides for the imposition of the death penalty for assassinating, or attempting to assassinate, Federal elective officeholders, or persons seeking election to Federal office.

titles.title: A bill to provide the death penalty for assassinating, or attempting to assassinate, Federal elective officeholders, or persons seeking election to Federal office.
